title: 'Free alcohol servings in morning, evening': Demands after Karnataka Budget
selftext: Give a man a fish & he will ask a free fish every day
comments: If there can be *free speech*, why can't there be *free beer*?
With so many freebies, what's one more

Free beer is next to the ultimate freebie.
To top that they'll have to go to free sex. Or free money.
Why not just replace it with water, we need to save water
Did anyone read the article? It says there is a free liquor scheme in Karnataka. Is this true? Couldn't find anything online

This comment is the ultimate example of why there shouldn't be free speech.

/s
Because there is no such thing as a free lunch
